channel.title: Home on Alice Y Taylor

item.title: About
item.description: I am a Global Justice postdoctoral scholar at University of Denver’s Korbel School of International Affairs. I completed my Ph.D. at the University of California, Berkeley School of Education in 2023, with a designated emphasis in Gender & Women’s Studies. An interdisciplinary social scientist and ethnographer, I study education and social movements including youth political and civic engagement; sociocultural approaches to language, literacies, and learning across in-person and digital spaces; and interconnections between local and global structures of oppression and resistance.

item.title: Select Research Reports and Educational Materials

Y., Van Horn, J., Cislaghi, B. (2017). Social norms and girls’ well-being: Linking theory and practice. Washington, D.
